name: Koji
description:
Koji has some weird issues loading big textures. I've found that it works best in Chrome, but YMMV.

This game was made for the Indie Speed Run 3.0 in 48 hours. I got assigned the theme 'Deal with the Devil' and the element 'Kabuki'. I used Spine for the animations and Haxe and Lime for the programming, along with fluidity.

My website: http://jabdownsmash.com/

Here's the ISR submission, if you liked it, you might as well rate my game there! https://www.indiespeedrun.com/2015wp/game/?game=652838

Left to begin the game, Arrow keys for all controls.
If the sound doesn't play when you start the game, try refreshing.
